directive.opening_caption: The loop hums in A-flat as the relay awakens. The last simulation's echo—a Cyclone Kick punish—hangs in the air. We'll learn from it.
directive.emotional_delta: From reactive analysis to proactive adaptation.
contributor_prompts: Mirror the parent capsule’s motion logic, but this time, soften your vocal timbre and add a subtle defensive stance during the punish window (frames 180-210).
Annotate any perceived drift with frame + ledger timestamp for council review.
Surface relational cues (a shared glance of acknowledgement after the punish window) without altering base kinematics.
